scripts.build-client-libs: lerna run dist --scope @cuba-platform/rest && lerna run compile --scope @cuba-platform/react
scripts.gen-client-scr: npm run build-generator && lerna run --scope @cuba-platform/front-generator gen-client-scr
scripts.bootstrap-react-app: npm run build-client-libs && npm run pack-client-libs && npm run gen-client-scr && npm run update-client-libs
scripts.react-all: npm run bootstrap-react-app && npm run start-cuba-app && npm run start-react-app
scripts.docs: npm run docs:api-reference && npm run docs:toc
